attributes.action: make the provision of professionally staffed libraries within all schools, both secondary and primary, statutory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current library provision for school pupils is at present patchy at best. They need properly organised resources of all kinds and the qualified librarians to teach them the skills to exploit those resources.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make the provision of professionally staffed libraries within all schools, both secondary and primary, statutory."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12263.asp
